title: Castro: The Declarations of Havana by Tariq Ali (.ePUB)
description:
Castro: The Declarations of Havana (Revolutions) by Tariq Ali

Requirements: .ePUB reader

Overview: In response to the American administration's attempt to isolate Cuba, Fidel Castro delivered a series of speeches designed to radicalize Latin American society. As Latin America experiences more revolutions in Venezuela and Bolivia, and continues to upset America's plans for neo-liberal imperialism, renowned radical writer and activist Tariq Ali provides a searing analysis of the relevance of Castro's message for today.

Genre: Non-Fiction > History
